page.title: 03Meals for a day in Patchway
page.content: A good English breakfast would consist of bacon, eggs, sausages, mushrooms, beans, and a glass of orange juice or a cup of tea or coffee, and toast. Cornflakes is another. Lunch would be a salad, of lettuce, cucumber, cheese, tomatoes, carrots, onions, celery and boiled potatoes. For a dressing youwould have a salad cream. If you have a snack between meals you would probably have a packet of crisps, an apple or perhaps an orange or biscuits. For tea you would have a good filling meal. My favourite meal would be fillet steak and chips, fried tomatoes with peas and a sprinke of parsley, for dressing I would have tomato ketchup or brown sauce. For a supper you would have cheese and crackers and a cup of tea.
